.specify/scripts/bash/analyze-session.sh
ls -la .specify/scripts/bash/analyze-session.sh && head -50 .specify/scripts/bash/analyze-session.sh
.specify/scripts/bash/analyze-session.sh 2>&1 || echo "Script requires session data"
.specify/scripts/bash/analyze-session.sh 2>&1 | head -100

PROJECT_DIR=$(pwd) && PROJECT_HASH=$(echo "$PROJECT_DIR" | sed 's|/|-|g; s|^-||') && SESSION_DIR="$HOME/.claude/projects/$PROJECT_HASH" && ls -la "$SESSION_DIR"/*.jsonl 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "No session files found"
ls -la specs/012-vvm-load-optimization/analyzed-action/ 2>/dev/null || echo "No analyzed-action directory"
TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && SESSION_HASH=$(echo "implement-session-$$" | md5sum | cut -c1-8) && echo "${TIMESTAMP}-${SESSION_HASH}"
ls -la specs/012-vvm-load-optimization/analyzed-action/

# セッションファイルを探す
PROJECT_DIR=$(pwd)
PROJECT_HASH=$(echo "$PROJECT_DIR" | sed 's|/|-|g; s|^-||')
SESSION_DIR="$HOME/.claude/projects/$PROJECT_HASH"

echo "=== Session Directory ==="
echo "$SESSION_DIR"
echo ""

echo "=== Available Files ==="
ls -la "$SESSION_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || echo "Directory not found"
echo ""

echo "=== Session Files (.jsonl) ==="
find "$SESSION_DIR" -name "*.jsonl" -type f 2>/dev/null | head -10 || echo "No .jsonl files"
echo ""

echo "=== Recent Session Directories ==="
ls -ldt "$SESSION_DIR"/*/ 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "No subdirectories"

# 代替ロケーションを探す
echo "=== ~/.claude/projects/ 内容 ==="
ls -la ~/.claude/projects/ 2>/dev/null | head -20 || echo "Not found"

echo ""
echo "=== ~/.claude/ 直下 ==="
ls -la ~/.claude/ 2>/dev/null | head -20

# プロジェクトのセッションディレクトリを確認
SESSION_DIR="$HOME/.claude/projects/-data-projects-text-reading-with-llm"

echo "=== セッションファイル一覧 ==="
ls -lt "$SESSION_DIR"/*.jsonl 2>/dev/null | head -10

echo ""
echo "=== 最新セッション ==="
LATEST=$(ls -t "$SESSION_DIR"/*.jsonl 2>/dev/null | head -1)
if [[ -n "$LATEST" ]]; then
  echo "File: $LATEST"
  echo "Size: $(du -h "$LATEST" | cut -f1)"
  echo "Lines: $(wc -l < "$LATEST")"
fi
.specify/scripts/bash/analyze-session.sh 41f1667f-2105-48c1-836e-4dd8f28454af 2>&1

# 1. Determine output directory
FEATURE_DIR=$(find specs -maxdepth 1 -type d 2>/dev/null | grep -v "^specs$" | head -1)

if [[ -n "$FEATURE_DIR" ]]; then
  OUTPUT_DIR="${FEATURE_DIR}/analyzed-action"
else
  OUTPUT_DIR="./analyzed-action"
fi

mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"
echo "OUTPUT_DIR=$OUTPUT_DIR"
echo "SESSION_TYPE=implement"

# Get current branch to determine feature
BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current)
echo "Current branch: $BRANCH"

# Find matching feature directory
if [[ "$BRANCH" =~ ^[0-9]+-.*$ ]]; then
  FEATURE_DIR="specs/$BRANCH"
  if [[ -d "$FEATURE_DIR" ]]; then
    OUTPUT_DIR="${FEATURE_DIR}/analyzed-action"
    mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"
    echo "OUTPUT_DIR=$OUTPUT_DIR"
  fi
fi

# Step 1: Determine Output Directory
PREREQ_SCRIPT=".specify/scripts/bash/check-prerequisites.sh"
[[ ! -f "$PREREQ_SCRIPT" ]] && PREREQ_SCRIPT="$HOME/.claude/scripts/check-prerequisites.sh"

# Parse FEATURE_DIR from check-prerequisites
FEATURE_DIR=$($PREREQ_SCRIPT --paths-only 2>/dev/null | grep "^FEATURE_DIR:" | cut -d: -f2 | tr -d ' ')

if [[ -n "$FEATURE_DIR" && -d "$FEATURE_DIR" ]]; then
  OUTPUT_DIR="${FEATURE_DIR}/analyzed-action"
else
  # Fallback: use branch name directly
  BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)
  if [[ -n "$BRANCH" && -d "specs/$BRANCH" ]]; then
    OUTPUT_DIR="specs/$BRANCH/analyzed-action"
  else
    OUTPUT_DIR="./analyzed-action"
  fi
fi

mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"
echo "FEATURE_DIR=$FEATURE_DIR"
echo "OUTPUT_DIR=$OUTPUT_DIR"

# Step 1: Determine Output Directory
BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)
if [[ -n "$BRANCH" && -d "specs/$BRANCH" ]]; then
  OUTPUT_DIR="specs/$BRANCH/analyzed-action"
else
  OUTPUT_DIR="./analyzed-action"
fi

mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"
echo "BRANCH=$BRANCH"
echo "OUTPUT_DIR=$OUTPUT_DIR"

# Step 3: Run Stage 1 with --output
OUTPUT_DIR="specs/012-vvm-load-optimization/analyzed-action"
.specify/scripts/bash/analyze-session.sh --output "$OUTPUT_DIR" --type implement 2>&1
